dmca.title: Fwd: [ABUSE] Regarding WebCodez.com websites, hosted by ThePlanet
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 20, 2006 12:46 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Regarding WebCodez.com websites, hosted by ThePlanet

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Monday, February 20,
2006 at
3:41:58 AM and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to
your team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] Regarding WebCodez.com websites, hosted by ThePlanet

MESSAGE BODY:
Hello ThePlanet,

I'm writing to you regarding webcodez.com website -- we were unable to get a
direct contact information of the website's owner as it's registered to a
wrong person, with no email or phone # info.

The only point of contact could be ThePlanet, as it's hosted in your
datacenter. This website has copied our web design, without our permission.
Please forward them this C&D letter.

________________________
Best regards,
Eugeny Naidenov
VideCodeZone.Com
webmaster@videocodezone.com

RFC822 HEADERS:
Received: from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=[216.185.111.52])
        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
        with esmtp (Exim)
        id 1FB7Xp-0001rE-O2; Mon, 20 Feb 2006 03:41:25 -0600
Received: from mx01 ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)
        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from webmaster@videocodezone.com)
        with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id
1FB7Xm-0001qk-Co
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 20 Feb 2006 03:41:22 -0600

        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
        webmaster@videocodezone.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1FB7Xk-000H0t-FC
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 20 Feb 2006 03:41:22 -0600
Received: from [83.219.131.139] (helo=zappp)
